member.remarks: Use the method to attach this class to the form you want to show popups from.

member.name: T:NuevoMundo.Generales.Clases.PopUpClass.PopupWindowHelper
member.summary: A class to assist in creating popup windows like Combo Box drop-downs and Menus. This class includes functionality to keep the title bar of the popup owner form active whilst the popup is displayed, and to automatically cancel the popup whenever the user clicks outside the popup window or shifts focus to another application.

member.name: E:NuevoMundo.Generales.Clases.PopUpClass.PopupWindowHelperMessageFilter.PopupCancel
member.summary: Raised when the Popup Window is about to be cancelled. The property can be set to true to prevent the form from being cancelled.

member.summary: The popup form

member.summary: The owning object.

member.param: The object which owns this class.

member.name: M:NuevoMundo.Generales.Clases.PopUpClass.PopupWindowHelperMessageFilter.PreFilterMessage(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)
member.summary: Checks the message loop for mouse messages whilst the popup window is displayed. If one is detected the position is checked to see if it is outside the form, and the owner is notified if so.
member.param: Windows Message about to be processed by the message loop
member.returns: true to filter the message, false otherwise. This implementation always returns false.

member.name: M:NuevoMundo.Generales.Clases.PopUpClass.PopupWindowHelperMessageFilter.OnMouseDown
member.summary: Checks the mouse location and calls the OnCancelPopup method if the mouse is outside the popup form.

member.summary: Raises the event.
member.param: The associated with the cancel event.

member.name: T:NuevoMundo.Generales.Clases.PopUpClass.PopupWindowHelperMessageFilter
member.summary: A Message Loop filter which detect mouse events whilst the popup form is shown and notifies the owning class when a mouse click outside the popup occurs.
